content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in an inheritance case the court determined that the deceased persons estate consists of two real estate properties the heirs who are the deceased persons son and daughter will each receive half of the estate the court initiated inheritance proceedings and the heirs provided their consent to accept their shares of the estate the court declared the heirs as the legal owners of half of the estate the net value of the estate is 6000 eur and the heirs are responsible for paying a court fee of 216 eur the court decision is final the text also explains the process of lodging an appeal in a legal case the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing copies of the appeal and stating the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be signed by the appellant or their lawyer the court fee must be paid when the appeal is lodged if the fee is not paid within the time limit the appeal is considered withdrawn
